info.title: Teamwork Projects
info.description: Keep all your team's tasks in one place. Collaborate and work in real time for real results. Teamwork Projects is a powerful and simple way to collaborate with your team.

post.description: This operation triggers when a new project is created.
post.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, create a project.

post.description: This operation triggers when a new task is created.
post.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, create a task.

post.description: This operation triggers when a new user is created.
post.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, create a user.

get.description: This operation returns a list of all projects associated with your account.

post.description: This operation is used to create a new Teamwork project.

get.description: This operation returns all properties asosciated with a specific project, given its id.
This operation is used to return a list of tasks for a given project.

post.description: This operation is used to create a new task.

get.description: This operation returns all properties asosciated with a specific task, given its id.

put.description: This operation is used to update the properties of a specific task.

delete.description: This operation is used to delete a task.

get.description: This operation returns a list of all users asosciated with a specific project.

post.description: This operation is used to create a new user.

get.description: This operation is used to get all details of a user.
This operation returns a list of all task lists.

newCompany.description: Enter the name of a new external company.

tags.description: A comma separated list of tags for the project.

notify.description: True to notify people assigned to this task by email.

tags.description: A comma separated list of tags for the task.

notify.description: True to notify people assigned to this task by email.

tags.description: A comma separated list of tags for the task.

projects.description: Array of all projects asosciated with your account.

id.description: Unique id of the project category.

harvest-timers-enabled.description: True if Harvest timer is enabled.

todo-items.description: List of tasks along with their properties.

GetTask_Response.description: Details associated with a specific task.

canComplete.description: True if the task can be completed.

canEdit.description: True if the task can be edited.

canLogTime.description: True if time can be logged to the task.

completed.description: True is the task is completed.

creator-avatar-url.description: Avatar URL of the task creator.

creator-firstname.description: First name of the task creator.

creator-lastname.description: Last name of the task creator.

has-dependencies.description: Number of dependencies the task has.

has-predecessors.description: Number of predecessors the task has.

parentTaskId.description: Unique Id of the parent task.

todo-list-id.description: Unique Id of the todo list.

userFollowingChanges.description: True if user is following changes.

userFollowingComments.description: True if user is following comments.

complete.description: True if the task is complete.

pinned.description: True if the task is pinned.
